issue.title: [CF 94] Not appearing in second spec
issue.body:
Description

Group 3 will not appear while in my secondary spec despite being enabled. Settings for primary spec appear to be working. This issue only appeared after the most recent update.

I have it set to appear only when in combat, but it does not appear at all, even when set to appear at all times.

Installed Addon Folders

Bartender4

Blizzard_ArchaeologyUI
